name: Stompingo
description:
Collect coins to buy off the bouty hunter, and avoid getting stomped by the monster. 

Play in 2 beautiful worlds Arctic and Dessert

Controls : Up/Down/left/right - move Forward/Back/Left/Right

All assets and models were designed by myself and are not free to use or relpicate. I did make a mobile build but it will be released later due to some shader problems.
